trait.name: Hustle
entries: The underboss can move through the space of any creature that is of a larger size, but it can't stop there.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The underboss makes three attacks, using {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} Blade or Arcane Firearm in any combination.

action.name: Poisoned Blade
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) Slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Poison damage, and the target has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the start of the underboss's next turn. If the target is already {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}, it instead takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Poison damage.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: {@actTrigger} The underboss is hit by an attack roll. {@actResponse} The underboss halves the damage (round down) it takes from that attack.
